chapter.title: Resource Preprocessing
chapter.para: The Statistic Manager provides an Interface to preprocess the StatisticData into the Aggregation-Definition Tables. Normally a cron-job runs every night and preprocesses the StatisticData from the day before. But if a new AggregationDefinition was created and the StatisticData of the last days/weeks shall be written into the AggregationTable then this Interface can be used.

Parameters of the interface-call are an aggregation-definition-id and an xml-record, according to the preprocessing-information-schema. The xml-record contains an element start-date and an element end-date.
The user that calls the interface has to have permissions to write content for the scope of the given aggregation-definition. (see chapter ‘security concept’)
